channel.title: Get On With It with Tineka Blake
channel.itunes:author: Tineka Blake
channel.description: Here's to getting on with life, or simply just figuring it out! This podcast contains real talk, real stories and real life! Here, we put in the time to discuss the very things that are holding you back from enjoying your life and achieving your full potential.

itunes:owner.itunes:name: Get On With It with Tineka Blake

item.title: How To Successfully Change Your Career
item.description: This episode is for you, if you are thinking about changing or starting a new career. Whether that in employment or starting your own business. Here I share the mindset required and actionable tips that you can employ to make yourself succeed on your journey. Show notes and references 1. Harvard Busines Review Article: https://hbr.org/2002/12/how-to-stay-stuck-in-the-wrong-career. 2. Book: War of Art, by Steven Pressfield, 2002 (Chapters 1 and 2). 3.Tiny Habits by BJ Fogg 2019
